name: Codex (ritenourj)
description:
This game will be an exploratory platformer with a few puzzles. You are an intrepid scout, following the remains of a former expedition that was searching for an artifact called the Ageless. Search the alien ruins of SR-Treeze to uncover the team's fate, the nature of the artifact, and how to leave.

This game was built in Unity using the 2D Gamekit, the Alien Tile Set, and Dark Forest assets. All rights go to their respective asset and music creators. I only created the story and the level design as my focus in on the Narrative Implementation of stories. If you are interested in checking out these assets and their creators, I have linked them below.

Note: You may have to click the game space before the controls can be used.

Packages

2D Game Kit (Tutorial Projects): Created by Unity Technologies:

Used pause & options menu, Health and Dialogue UI, tile map in level five, environment art, particles, interactables prefabs, Ellen, enemies and environment dangers (acid, spawners, spikes). 

Alien Tile Set (2D Textures & Materials):

Created by Project Makers

Used tile set, particles, moons, VFX, art

Pixel Dark Forest (2D Environments): Created by Szadi Art.:

Used for reference.
